Description

Ingredients:

  • 40g of boiled shrimps
  • 100g of boiled rice of your favorite variety
  • 40g of tomatoes
  • 40g of avocado pulp
  • 15 grams of fresh onion sprig of fresh basil
  • 10 grams of vegan cheese or tofu

For lemon kimchi sauce:

  • 2 tbsp 1 ready-made kimchi sauce
  • 1 tsp lime juice
  • 1 tsp olive oil
  • sprig of conander leaves
  • black pepper
